definition: Forest of Steles (museum in Xi'an)/Beilin District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
a monument/an upright stone tablet/stele/CL:塊|块[kuai4],面[mian4]
surname Lin/Japanese surname Hayashi
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
Beilin District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi

sentences.english: Rubbings have been made from the majority of stone tablets here.
sentences.chinese: 這座碑林裏的大部分石碑都已經拓印完畢。

sentences.english: Daniel, how do you think of the forest of steles?
sentences.chinese: 大牛，你覺得碑林怎麼樣啊？

sentences.english: There are still a lot more interesting aspects about these steles here.
sentences.chinese: 這碑林裏還有很多吸引人的地方呢。

sentences.english: The paper belongs to the early study of the preservation planning of Xi"an Forest of Steles ."
sentences.chinese: 本論文是屬於西安碑林保護規劃的前期研究部分。

sentences.english: "Gained merit in battle" reads the epitaph of two of the 231 eminent Shaolin monks honored with shrines in the Pagoda Forest.
sentences.chinese: 碑林中的神龕是用來紀念少林寺的231名傑出僧侶。

sentences.english: OK, I'll take you to the stele forest at the Yin Ruins tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 那好，明天就帶你去殷墟的碑林看看。

sentences.english: Jinshan to the pavilion to win, mte known for Forest of Stone Tablets.
sentences.chinese: 金山以樓閣取勝，焦山因碑林見長。

sentences.english: Xi'an Ancient City Wall, Big Goose Pagoda, Forest of Stelae Museum Half- Day Private Tour.
sentences.chinese: 西安古城牆，大雁塔，碑林博物館半日遊。
